summary:
Cornell University is a prestigious private university in Ithaca, New York, founded in 1865. It has a diverse student body of over 26,000 students from the U.S. and around the world. The university offers a wide range of programs through its eight undergraduate colleges and seven graduate divisions. 

Cornell has multiple campuses, including locations in New York City and Qatar. It is known for its academic excellence, with many notable alumni, including Nobel laureates and successful business leaders. The university also has strong ties to the State University of New York system, with several state-supported colleges.
title: Cornell University
